attributes.action: Say NO to The Community Science College at Thornhill proposed closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lib-labour administration in Kirklees have proposed to close The Community Science College at Thornhill and Castle Hall School, and then merge them both into one new 'superschool' to be built in Ravensthorpe. Thornhill is a very sucessful school, so please sign our petition to share your feelings with the local council administration.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
